strings.INTERACTABLE_SHRINE_REPAIR_DESCRIPTION_P: Allows you to repair a single item stack of your selection. Price of repair will be shown on the icon.
strings.INTERACTABLE_SHRINE_REPAIR_PICKERPANEL_H:
Shrine of Repair
Fixing smart design decisions for half the price!
strings.ITEM_HEALINGPOTIONCONSUMED_DESC: Imagine being Hopoo and not implementing descriptions for base game items.
